website_summaries.verdict: The screen has 4K resolution, the aluminum frame fares well in various weather conditions, and the picture looks great in full shade.
pros: Built to last in the elements of the great outdoors
Customers love the sound quality and find the unit looks especially good on decks
cons: Some think the screen brightness should be better

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture!
customer_reviews.text: Just had this TV mounted out on my screened porch. Impressive picture day or night. We love it our neighbors love it and even my installer commented on how great this looked. Love the ability to watch the hockey playoffs or major league baseball games outside. Very happy with my purchase so far. PRO Built in speaker gives adequate volume. 2 USB Ports CONS I wish that the Bluetooth USB micro adapter I plugged in would work. Menu options seem scarce. Wondering what would happen if I connected Chrome or a firestick. Would it even work?
customer_reviews.author: Dusk

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be more pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I recently had a roof put on my deck and decided it was time for an outside tv. After a lot of research settled on the Sunbrite Veranda 4K tv despite seeing a few negative comments. I couldn't be more pleased with the purchase. If you a looking for a tv with a lot of bells and whistles you may want to upgrade but for just enjoying sports or other shows/movies this tv is perfect. Easy installation and great picture.
customer_reviews.author: DG2

customer_reviews.title: Still a glare in the shade..
customer_reviews.text: So far so good I guess. The sound is pretty good to me. I don't need a soundbar at all. However, even though it is in full shade under my patio the glare is almost unbearable during the daytime. Awesome picture at night but not so good during the day. This is quite disappointing considering the price...I thought the veranda was for use in full shade....I'll try to upload photos later.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor tv!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, great picture. This is exactly what we were looking for to put on our deck. We put it on a rolling stand because in this rainy climate though the tv is made for outdoors, we will bring it inside for the winter. Sitting on the deck with a glass of wine watching our favorite program is the best! This tv is highly recommended. The sound is good but my husband is talking about a sound bar. We'll never be inside !!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Farino

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I use it everyday and it has withstood some weather without being covered. I have it where it is in the shade most of the time but I use it mostly at night. I bought a Blue Tooth adabter and attached it to the bottom so I can use my Bose speaker.
customer_reviews.author: jvi83

customer_reviews.title: The TV is terrific, fantastic picture
customer_reviews.text: The TV is terrific, fantastic picture. We had some issues with the FedEx delivery and Cody from Sunbrite jumped in and took care if it. Outstanding service!
customer_reviews.author: Margret77

customer_reviews.title: Great TV.
customer_reviews.text: Tried an indoor TV in my outdoor (under roof) location near a pool. It did not last long. Bought the SunBrite Veranda 43" TV and it is perfect for my out door location under a roof on my pool deck/lanai. The indoor TV was not bright enough during very bright sunny days, but this TV is great on the sunniest days. Time will tell about its longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Mast

customer_reviews.title: HOLD UP WELL TO EXTREME WEATHER
customer_reviews.text: I really like this TV but as the others have stated I could really do with a soundbar to make the volume a little louder (FYI I like loud music so it might be fine for those with sensitive ears). So far it's stood up to the extreme temps we have here in NC. If you've ever been here you know it can snow in the AM and by lunch you need shorts and a tank top for the 100 degree weather. I am very satisfied with this product and if not for the volume I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Nowell

customer_reviews.title: Color is excellant!
customer_reviews.text: The only problem we had was opening the back of the remote control. There are 3 very little screws and I had to go buy a screw driver to fit the screws. A better design would be a thumb push on the back of the remote like the cable remote.
customer_reviews.author: janice l

customer_reviews.title: Great TV!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tv! Great picture! Arrive earlier than expected! Really nice picture!
customer_reviews.author: TBaskey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful TV
customer_reviews.text: TV came packaged extremely well. I'm very impressed with the picture quality. I wouldn't hesitate buying another at some time! Depending on the type of mount purchased, you may need to make a trip to the hardware store to purchase standoff bushings.
customer_reviews.author: Steve G.

customer_reviews.title: Good tv
customer_reviews.text: Great resolution, does good in our screened porch, only issue is sound needs improvement. Probably will get sound bar, however, this is not a major issue.
customer_reviews.author: Peter L.Bunce

customer_reviews.title: Great tv
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful tv for our outdoor pavilon. Under a roof, lot of light and a great picture. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Cole

customer_reviews.title: These are great TVs easy to see in daylight
customer_reviews.text: These are great TVs easy to see in daylight, good sound, nice compartment in back with room for Amazon stick or similar. Suggestion would be to get a flexible hdmi cable adapter to make install easier.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Witt

customer_reviews.title: Good outdoor TV
customer_reviews.text: Great picture. Instructions are terrible. Remote is poor. The rest is good. The sound is fair but could use an external speaker.
customer_reviews.author: DRF

customer_reviews.title: Great picture!
customer_reviews.text: So far it's been great! My only complaint is the sound isn't so great for something made for the outdoors. I had to buy external speakers to produce the volume and clarity I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent picture! When the tv arrived initially
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture! When the tv arrived initially, it had a scratch on the screen. Sunbright replaced it without waiting for the return. The second TV arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: william j. kilberg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: TV works great. The picture is very clear and crisp. Easy set up.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Walsh

customer_reviews.title: and getting started were the best
customer_reviews.text: The ease of assembly, getting connected, and getting started were the best part
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hook up and has a great picture
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hook up and has a great picture. The first one I received was damaged and I sent it back, I had a replacement quickly. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: David Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great picture. Works great for our covered patio. Met all of our expectations. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: David Everman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Picture is bright and crisp sound not so good putting on a sound bar today
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customerbob in south Florida

customer_reviews.title: Sad story with a happy ending
customer_reviews.text: Sad story with a happy ending. The TV arrived on Friday in perfect physical condition but had some internal malfunction. I e-mailed customer service on Saturday morning. Someone got back to me on SATURDAY and after sending a couple of pictures via email my replacement TV was on its way without any BS of waiting to get the defective unit back first. I received my replacement TV on Friday and it works better than I imagined. I love this TV! My only wish is it had a better speaker. These guys are first class.
customer_reviews.author: CR in the Clarita

customer_reviews.title: but we love it.
customer_reviews.text: We have used our Sunbrite only a few times so far, but we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Connie’s Outdoor TV
customer_reviews.text: Technical support was great - they helped identifying my problem and resolving the issue - Brittany and Mike were very helpful - the picture on the tv is outstanding
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Furby

customer_reviews.title: Not a good performer
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I can't get into a long epilogue about my feeling. But the TV didn't perform the way I presumed a TV of that price always should, along with a very subpar Digital image on a brand new HDcable box. The lack speaker capabilities and the difficulty in setup, and resealing the wiring was a joke. Also I could not get the remote to respond beyond 12 inches Away from the face, I swear nothing helped not new batteries, bow cleaning and resetting, nothing. So sad because I have them on beautiful spot in my backyard set up for the TV and nothing to put there for these beautiful summer days
customer_reviews.author: Mayer Dahan

customer_reviews.title: the sound from the built-in speakers is terrible. The speaker in my cell phone sounds better
customer_reviews.text: TV stopped working 5 months after purchase. Will not turn on anymore. Also, the sound from the built-in speakers is terrible. The speaker in my cell phone sounds better! The labels on the remote control are virtually unreadable making it impossible to use unless you shine a flashlight on it or memorize the buttons. Hopefully, they will honor the 1-year warranty. I'm about to find out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sound is not loud enough for outside. Picture is okay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... twice as bright tv is ok but not as good as i expected for the
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as bright as i expected my oled is twice as bright tv is ok but not as good as i expected for the price
customer_reviews.author: Mike R

customer_reviews.title: The picture out of the box is by far the best I have seen under similar brightness conditions and my ...
customer_reviews.text: Idid a lot of research on weather proof/ out door tv's for my new screen porch. I probably read several hundred reviews on a dozen or so tv's, I was a bit concerned after reading some of the reviews on this tv, but decided to take a chance. I was elated on the simple setup, The picture out of the box is by far the best I have seen under similar brightness conditions and my neighbors will attest to the sound volume and quality. I feel bad that some people have had the issues they have listed, but for me, this is a winner at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kovarik

product_meta.title: SunBriteTV Outdoor TV 43-Inch Veranda (1st Gen) 4K Ultra HDTV LED Black - SB-4374UHD-BL
feature_bullets: REPLACED BY 2nd Gen Veranda model SB-V-43-4KHDR-BL

specifications.Special Features: Operating Temperature -24 to 104 degrees F., Powder-coated rust-proof aluminum exterior protects internal components from rain, snow, insects, humidity, salt air
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars49 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
